constraints.name: query_limit
constraints.description: 询问次数限制（不超过 50000 次）

constraints.name: binary_tree_structure
constraints.description: 树结构为满二叉树，根节点度数为 2 或 0
constraints.formal: if n == 1 then root_degree = 0 else root_degree = 2

constraints.name: root_parent_constraint
constraints.description: 根节点的父亲为其自身

constraints.name: nearest_common_ancestor_query
constraints.description: 每次查询返回两个节点路径中离根最近的节点编号
